message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product.  While $11,000 is a good starting point, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to offer $10,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
